verbose_text: Appropriate expression of zinc transporters and packaging of insulin have previously been confirmed in the SC-beta population (Pagliuca et al., 2014), and high intracellular zinc has been used to image and isolate the islet beta cell population (Burdette, Frederickson, Bu, & Lippard, 2003; Latif, Noel, & Alejandro, 1988; Lukowiak et al., 2001; Meeusen, Tomasiewicz, Nowakowski, & Petering, 2011).
